content.en: Branch prediction optimization: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of branch prediction in computer processors. These algorithms, such as branch alignment, evidence-based static prediction, and neural branch prediction, aim to minimize pipeline penalties, reduce cache miss rates, and improve power efficiency. By using machine learning and static techniques, these algorithms are able to make more accurate predictions and optimize the performance of branch prediction units.
content.da: Grenforudsigelsesoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af grenforudsigelse i computerprocessorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom grentilpasning, evidensbaseret statisk forudsigelse og neurale grenforudsigelser, sigter mod at minimere pipeline-straffe, reducere cache-missrater og forbedre energieffektiviteten. Ved at bruge maskinlæring og statiske teknikker er disse algoritmer i stand til at foretage mere præcise forudsigelser og optimere ydeevnen af grenforudsigelses-enheder.
